page.title: 04Trent Floodplain
page.content: Map ref. 240190. This area is flat farmland on the Trent floodplain.There are two farms,{ {Barn Farm}and{Flint Mill Farm.}Chief crops are potatoes and cereals such as barley for{Burton breweries,}while a few Friesians are grazed at{Flint Mill.} Here are the Stapenhill to Roslinton Lane and the Swadlincote to Drakelow Lane,used by South Derbyshire and Leicestershire coal lorries supplying the Power Station.Drakelow Power Station employees travel by this lane and also the Stapenhill to Walton Lane, which is screened on the north side by a belt of interesting trees of many varieties.
